title: Explanation(I) Irrespective of their distance from the aerodrome, even beyond the 20-km limit from the aerodrome reference point, no building, radio masts or similar installation exceeding 150 m in height shall be erected without the permission of the Civil Aviation Authorities
clause_text: Explanation(I) Irrespective of their distance from the aerodrome, even beyond the 20-km limit from the aerodrome reference point, no building, radio masts or similar installation exceeding 150 m in height shall be erected without the permission of the Civil Aviation Authorities.
section: Height restrictions in the vicinity of aerodromes
